title: Crazy thoughts
content: Say I get 6 or 7 gpa in sem1 and 9.2 or 9 in sem 2 what will be my cgpa?

comments.body: just take the average bruv
You guys don't know how to calculate average? This batch is cooked.
Idk how to calculate sgpa itself😭
Subreddit FAQ exists
So when I take the average it becomes 8. Something despite scoring 9. Something in sem2😭
well you did score 6 in first sem
Duh 7 not 6
Ye wt ever it is less only
Who tf let these niggas come till engg bro😭😭😭
Bruh I thought there's something related to credits like more weight age or something now ik it's just avg
Pls don't act ur some genius or something it's just a small doubt I had regarding the calculation😭
it will be 8
Got to know thanks sir

https://preview.redd.it/ztw7tmegzy8e1.png?width=1240&format=pjpg&auto=webp&s=45db38c9373f1b46fee4c19ac0646d09a5acb928

Open your goddamn eyes and look up the FAQ section sometime 👀.
Thanks for reminding sir I forgot faq exists
Bruh how you gonna pass M1 and M2
Chill sir I thought there's something related to credits and weight age now I know it's average..you guys act like some elon musk ngl

Bro cgpa = cumulative grade point AVERAGE. What else did you assume.


No one here thinks they're Elon Musk, we are just amused by this stupidity.
There's nothing geniui. R
Duh there's something called credits here and I had no clue abt it like how it works and stuffs it's not stupid it's a small doubt which u guys are making fun of
There's nothing genius about calculating average lil bro😭
Light mode wale aagaye bhaaago 🏃‍♂️‍➡️🏃‍♂️‍➡️
Hum teri tarah dark dank wale type nhi hai maaf karo 😮‍💨😮‍💨🙏🏼🙏🏼.
Bruh... joke tha bas.. ye lo toffee khao 🍬 and sorry 🤗
